title: Are audiobooks popular in Japan? - Quora

response.answer_text: Instead of “audiobooks”, something called “drama CDs” are popular in Japan. They are essentially the same thing, but drama CDs tend to cover manga and light novel more than novels. These are especially popular among manga and light novel fanatics, but not necessarily the general population.
apparently not. Why do most Japanese people never use or don’t seem to be aware of audiobooks?
